description: When visiting Radstock, Holcombe Inn is a great choice to consider. For a bite to eat, guests can check out The Holcombe Inn, which serves local cuisine and is open for breakfast, lunch, and dinner. Other highlights at this luxurious inn include a bar/lounge, and rooms offer fireplaces and room service.

DESCRIPTION.value: When visiting Radstock, Holcombe Inn is a great choice to consider. For a bite to eat, guests can check out The Holcombe Inn, which serves local cuisine and is open for breakfast, lunch, and dinner. Other highlights at this luxurious inn include a bar/lounge, and rooms offer fireplaces and room service.

HOTEL_AMENITY.value:
The inn offers a restaurant. A bar/lounge is on site where guests can unwind with a drink. Guests can enjoy a complimentary breakfast. Public areas are equipped with complimentary high-speed wireless Internet access.

Complimentary self parking is available on site.

Holcombe Inn is a smoke-free property.

DINING.value:
Guests are offered a complimentary full breakfast.
The Holcombe Inn - This restaurant specializes in local cuisine and serves breakfast, lunch, and dinner. Guests can enjoy drinks at the bar. A children's menu is available.
Room service is available.

CHECK_IN_POLICY.value:
Extra-person charges may apply and vary depending on hotel policy.
Government-issued photo identification and a credit card or cash deposit are required at check-in for incidental charges.
Special requests are subject to availability upon check-in and may incur additional charges. Special requests cannot be guaranteed.

NEARBY_POINTS_OF_INTEREST.value:
Downside Abbey - 1.4 km / 0.9 mi
Radstock Museum - 5.6 km / 3.4 mi
Farrington Park Golf Club - 6 km / 3.8 mi
Kilver Court - 7.5 km / 4.6 mi
Nunney Castle - 8 km / 5 mi
Royal Bath and West Showground - 10.6 km / 6.6 mi
Wells Cathedral - 12.3 km / 7.6 mi
Wells Bishop's Palace - 12.3 km / 7.6 mi
Wookey Hole - 13.7 km / 8.5 mi
Bath Spa University - 14.7 km / 9.1 mi
Stanton Drew Stone Circle - 15.1 km / 9.4 mi
Bath City Farm - 15.3 km / 9.5 mi
Longleat Safari and Adventure Park - 15.5 km / 9.6 mi
Longleat - 15.5 km / 9.6 mi
Hauser and Wirth Somerset - 15.5 km / 9.6 mi

The preferred airport for Holcombe Inn is Bristol (BRS-Bristol Intl.) - 22.1 km / 13.7 mi.

Distances are calculated in a straight line from the property's location to the point of interest or airport and may not reflect actual travel distance.

Distances are displayed to the nearest 0.1 km and mile.

LOCATION_TEASER.value:
Location
Situated in Radstock, this luxury inn is 1.2 mi (2 km) from Downside Abbey and within 6 mi (10 km) of Radstock Museum and Kilver Court. Farrington Park Golf Club and Nunney Castle are also within 9 mi (15 km).

KNOW_BEFORE_YOU_GO.value: • The property has connecting/adjoining rooms, which are subject to availability and can be requested by contacting the property using the number on the booking confirmation.

FEES.value:
The following fees and deposits are charged by the property at time of service, check-in, or check-out.


  • Crib (infant bed) fee: GBP 20 per night

The above list may not be comprehensive. Fees and deposits may not include tax and are subject to change.

TAGLINE.value: Luxury inn in Radstock with restaurant, bar/lounge

HCOM_KEY_FACTS_AT_CHECK_IN.value:
• Credit card or cash deposit required

  • Government-issued photo ID required

HCOM_INTERNET_AT_A_GLANCE.value:
• Free WiFi in public areas

  • Free WiFi in rooms

HCOM_DINING.value: The Holcombe Inn - This restaurant specializes in local cuisine and serves breakfast, lunch, and dinner. Guests can enjoy drinks at the bar. A children's menu is available.

HCOM_FACILITY_POLICIES.value: The property has connecting/adjoining rooms, which are subject to availability and can be requested by contacting the property using the number on the booking confirmation.

HCOM_FEES_TRAVELING_WITH_KIDS.value: Cribs/Infant beds are available for GBP 20 per night

HOTEL_FREEBIES.value: • Free full breakfast, free WiFi, and free parking

HOTEL_FEATURE.value:
• 8 smoke-free guestrooms
  • Restaurant and bar/lounge
  • Luggage storage
  • Limited hour front desk

ROOM_FEATURE.value: When visiting Radstock, Holcombe Inn is a great choice to consider. For a bite to eat, guests can check out The Holcombe Inn, which serves local cuisine and is open for breakfast, lunch, and dinner. Other highlights at this luxurious inn include a bar/lounge, and rooms offer fireplaces and room service.
